text: The capital of France is Paris. France is located in Western Europe.
The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower in Paris. It's 330 meters tall.
French cuisine is renowned worldwide. Popular dishes include croissants and coq au vin.
The Louvre Museum is the world's largest art museum located in Paris.
RWTH is a brilliant university. RWTH is located in Aachen.
BI-K is an amazing research institute. BI-K is located in Cologne.
